dcterms:description: The Lebanese Wheat dataset comprises high-quality annotated polygons for wheat and non-wheat classes for the study area in Beqaa, Lebanon, with a total surface of 170 km², over five consecutive years from 2016 to 2020.
dcterms:title: Lebanese Wheat dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Tarasiou
E. Chavez
S. Zafeiriou
dcterms:description: The PASTIS dataset is used for training the TSViT model, focusing on satellite image time series.
dcterms:title: PASTIS dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Rußwurm
M. Körner
dcterms:description: The Munich 480 dataset covers an area of 102 km * 42 km in Munich, Germany, consisting of 30 images per year split into 48 ∗ 48 tiles made of all 13 Sentinel-2 bands and covering 27 different crop classes.
dcterms:title: Munich 480 dataset

dcterms:description: The Beqaa-Lebanon dataset was labeled for this project, where approximately 2,000 wheat parcels per year from 2016 to 2019 were annotated, along with an equivalent area of negative samples (non-wheat areas) per year to balance the dataset.
dcterms:title: Beqaa-Lebanon dataset
